title: July 30th, 2021 - Rick & Bubba Show
description:
Sponsor:
At Uprising™, they are waging war on gut health! They want you to finally win. With 95% of people suffering from the fiber gap it's time for the good gut bugs to get some reinforcements. The weapons of choice, the Uprising™ superfood cube + chip combo, the likes of which this world has never seen before. Between the painstakingly chosen ingredients and the perfectly proportioned recipe, the foods pack an unmatched health boosting + taste buds pleasing combination! Go to UprisingFood.com and use promo code RickBubba to get $10 off the Starter Bundle. It's kinda like a mini trip to the grocery store minus all the unhealthy distractions. And they ship directly to your door.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
